title: Study of ternary deep eutectic solvents to enhance the bending properties of ash wood
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8090-8099
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00357H, Paper

Ruocai Bai, Wenhao Wang, Mengyao Chen, Yan Wu
Deep eutectic solvents (DESs) are considered one of the most promising biomass pretreatment reagents, and their research applications in woody fibrous biomass are increasing yearly.
